meanings.definition: To give a portion or share of something
meanings.sent1: She imparts her wisdom to the younger generation.
meanings.sent2: The teacher imparts knowledge to her students every day.
meanings.sent3: The magician imparts his secrets to the audience with a wink.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun imparts a warm glow to the evening sky.
meanings.sent5: The storyteller imparts a sense of wonder with each tale.

meanings.definition: To make known or communicate information
meanings.sent1: He imparts the news of the day to his friends.
meanings.sent2: The radio imparts important updates to the listeners.
meanings.sent3: The parrot imparts a funny joke to the delight of everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile imparts happiness to all who see it.
meanings.sent5: The sign language interpreter imparts meaning to the words for the deaf audience.

meanings.sent1: The fairy imparts magical powers to the brave hero.
meanings.sent2: The king imparts titles to his loyal subjects.
meanings.sent3: The chef imparts flavor to the dish with a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: The sun imparts warmth to the cold earth.
meanings.sent5: The mentor imparts valuable advice to the eager apprentice.
